name: 高等天文物理
description: 本課程介紹各類天文現象背後的物理原理，主題包含了天體力學、氣體動力學、恆星演化、恆星與星系的行成、以及天體輻射相關的物理。
goals: 期望學生知道與理解天文基本知識，以及天文學發展史
在教學過程中，讓學生習得獨立思考、歸納的能力
教導學生資料收集、閱讀、吸收與宇文表達
在撰寫讀書報告過程中，能夠學習彼此溝通與表達的能力
syllabus:
01 lecture introduction

02 Overview of topics in astrophysics, units, physics & observations – walkthrough of textbooks

03 Gravity and related phenomena, timescales

04 celestial mechanics --> Gas dynamics and stellar evolution

05 Gravity & mass vs dynamics & pressure

06 stellar structure

07 \*\* Presentation of selected paper and associated cometary article

08 midterm exam

09 Review of midterm exam / compact objects

10 Temperature/mass/velocity vs observations

11 Radiations and continuum spectra: blackbody, bremsstrahlung, synchrotron

12 Interaction of light and media: Compton scattering, photoelectric absorption, opacity

13 Radiative transfer and spectral lines

14 Accretion disk and radiation from compact objects

15 Jets, Large scale structure, lensing and cosmological model, Relativity and magnetic field

16 final exam

17    教師彈性補充教學 \*\* Presentations I -- review of selected ARAA paper

18    教師彈性補充教學 \*\* Presentations II -- review of astrophysics in your thesis project

methodologies.note: 進行資料蒐集、分析與撰寫報告，並口頭表達

grading.note: 期中考＋期末考＋（書面╱口頭）報告＋作業＋課堂參與及討論
